price: 21. En wees niet zoals degenen die zeiden: “Wij hebben gehoord,” maar zij hoorden niet.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
